Name: Letters From the Moon
About the game: Dorothy Chen is the first Chinese-American woman on the moon, but she has a problem: her mission crash landed there. With rescue days away, Dorothy searches for a way to survive and finds a vast underground alien city. The aliens have died log ago, but she finds an educational simulation in the form of a holographic cat, Jiqi, to help her navigate the strange city with all of its dangers. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to YOU in this pick your own story adventure with over 30 different endings. This game is an interactive book with additional features such as inventory and achievements.
